sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( PKCL_CORP_CODE ,PKCL_COME_CODE ,PKCL_TABL_ID ,PKCL_COLM_ID ,PKCL_SORT_NUMB ,PKCL_COLM_NAME ,PKCL_DATA_TYPE ,PKCL_DATA_LENG ,PKCL_COLM_ALGN ,PKCL_WITH_SCRN ,PKCL_DISP_ALLW ,PKCL_UPDT_DATE ,PKCL_UPDT_CMAN ,PKCL_INIT_DATE ,PKCL_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_CORP_CODE', 1, '법인코드', 'VARCHAR', '4', 'C', '60', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:39', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240510 19:57:39', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_STND_GUBN', 2, '표준구분', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '60', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEMPK', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_STND_DEGR', 3, '개정차수', 'VARCHAR', '10', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:39', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240510 19:57:39', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_MATL_SEQ0', 4, '재료SEQ', 'NUMBER', '5', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEMPK', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_MATL_GUBN', 5, '재료구분', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:39', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240510 19:57:39', 'SYSTEMPG' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_MATT_CODE', 6, '재질구분', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:39', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:39', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_SHAP_CODE', 8, '소재형태', 'VARCHARHAR2', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_PROD_CODE', 8, '적용부품', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240510 19:57:39', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240510 19:57:39', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_2CUT_CODE', 9, '2차 CUT', 'VARCHARHAR2', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_BEND_YN', 10, 'BENDING', 'VARCHARHAR2', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_MAKE_YN', 11, '조관여부', 'VARCHARHAR2', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_MATL_NAME', 12, '재료명', 'VARCHARHAR2', '50', 'L', '120', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_MATL_PRIC', 13, '재료단가', 'NUMBER', '14', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_MATL_COEF1', 14, '적용계수1', 'NUMBER', '20', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_MATL_COEF2', 15, '적용계수2', 'NUMBER', '20', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_MATL_UNIT', 16, '단위', 'VARCHARHAR2', '8', 'C', '60', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_APPL_GUBN', 17, '적용여부', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '60', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_REMK', 18, 'REMARK', 'VARCHARHAR2', '200', 'L', '200', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_UPDT_CMAN', 19, '수정자', 'VARCHARHAR2', '8', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_UPDT_DATE', 20, '수정일', 'VARCHARHAR2', '8', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_INIT_CMAN', 21, '등록자', 'VARCHARHAR2', '8', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PIWR', 'CATBPIWM', 'PIWM_INIT_DATE', 22, '등록일', 'VARCHARHAR2', '8', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CREATED_YN ,CASE WHEN C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END COMMENTS_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE >= A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE > D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_COLM_ALGN != D.PKCL_COLM_ALGN THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_WITH_SCRN != D.PKCL_WITH_SCRN THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND C.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBPKCL D ON D.PKCL_CORP_CODE = A.PKCL_CORP_CODE AND D.PKCL_COME_CODE = A.PKCL_COME_CODE AND D.PKCL_TABL_ID = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND D.PKCL_COLM_ID = A.PKCL_COLM_ID ORDER BY A.PKCL_SORT_NUMB

CREATE TABLE CATBPIWM ( PIWM_CORP_CODE VARCHAR2(4) ,PIWM_STND_GUBN CHAR(1) ,PIWM_STND_DEGR VARCHAR2(10) ,PIWM_MATL_SEQ0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PIWM_MATL_GUBN VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWM_MATT_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWM_SHAP_CODE VARCHARHAR2(8) ,PIWM_PROD_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PIWM_2CUT_CODE VARCHARHAR2(8) ,PIWM_BEND_YN VARCHARHAR2(8) ,PIWM_MAKE_YN VARCHARHAR2(8) ,PIWM_MATL_NAME VARCHARHAR2(50) ,PIWM_MATL_PRIC NUMBER(14, 6) ,PIWM_MATL_COEF1 NUMBER(20, 6) ,PIWM_MATL_COEF2 NUMBER(20, 6) ,PIWM_MATL_UNIT VARCHARHAR2(8) ,PIWM_APPL_GUBN CHAR(1) ,PIWM_REMK VARCHARHAR2(200) ,PIWM_UPDT_CMAN VARCHARHAR2(8) ,PIWM_UPDT_DATE VARCHARHAR2(8) ,PIWM_INIT_CMAN VARCHARHAR2(8) ,PIWM_INIT_DATE VARCHARHAR2(8) ,CONSTRAINT CATBPIWM_PK PRIMARY KEY( PIWM_CORP_CODE ,PIWM_STND_GUBN ,PIWM_STND_DEGR ,PIWM_MATL_SEQ0 ,PIWM_MATL_GUBN ) )
WITH T1 (C1, C2) AS ( SELECT 'CORP_CODE','법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'COME_CODE','공법' FROM DUAL ) SELECT * FROM T1
